Common.Highlight.Common.Text: 1129 Westchester Avenue 136,000 SF
1111 Westchester Avenue 237,000 SF
Trophy Class A Office space
Bright open floor plans
Spacious cafe with outdoor dining areas
State-of-the-art fitness center
Complimentary shuttle to/from nearby train stations

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Ideally located at the converge of I-287, The Hutchinson River Parkway and I-684

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Two-Building Class A Trophy Campus 373,00 Sq.Ft. Available

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Direct access to all major highways including I-287, I-684, I-95 and the Merritt/Hutchinson River Parkways

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Property is located within a five-building office park
Building amenities include full service cafeteria and fitness center
Park amenities include two full service cafeterias, fitness center, conference room and storage space
Barber shop, Chase Bank, Summerfield Suites and EastRidge Enrichment (day care) available in adjacent Exchange properties
Responsive on-site property management
Planned renovations to restrooms, corridor & lobby finishes and demo/pre-build spaces
Cablevision, Optimum Business, Lightpath and Verizon Copper, Fiber & Fios available
24/7 card key access
Park is serviced by the Westchester County Bee-Line bus system
Free on-site surface parking at a ratio of 3.0/1,000 rsf

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Security lobby desk is manned 24/7/365
Key card access after hours
One of the only office buildings in Westchester County to provide direct access to both Metro-North train lines
Private Shuttle service to White Plains (Harlem line) and and Mamaroneck (New Haven line) Metro-North Train Stations

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Suburban - Immediate access to the Hutchinson River Parkway, I-95, downtown White Plains

Available through December 2022
